display.title: Public Liability Insurance
display.subtitle: Public Liability Insurance
display.bodyHtml: We’ll ask about your business activities and the level of cover you need.

questions.title: When do you want cover to start?
Is the business based in the UK?
Do you work at height above 10 metres?
Do you work at depth (excavations) below 3 metres?
Do you use heat away from your own premises?
Any hazardous materials or chemicals used?
Any liability claims in the last 5 years?

display.title: Claims
display.bodyHtml: This section supports multiple items in a full build. For this prototype we’ll capture one item.

questions.title: What type of claim was it?
Have you ever had insurance declined, cancelled or voided?
Here’s your indicative quote. Choose annual or monthly payments.

display.title: Here’s your indicative quote. Choose annual or monthly payments.
display.bodyHtml: Here’s your indicative quote. Choose annual or monthly payments.

questions.title: How would you like to pay?

- Injury or damage to third parties

Typical cover

  • Injury or damage to third parties
  • Legal defence costs
  • Cover at the locations you work

questions.title:
**Common exclusions**
- Deliberate acts
- Contractual liability beyond policy te

display.bodyHtml:
Common exclusions
